umpchange,11,umphome,clara901 umpchange,11,ump1b,merrd901 umpchange,11,ump2b,(None) $Cliff Johnson ran into HP umpire Lou DiMuro after scoring a run and both fell to the ground; Johnson suffered slight injuries but DiMuro suffered major injuries; DiMuro was taken off the field on a stretcher after a 30-minute wait for the ambulance

ej,bambg101,M,neudj901,Call at 1B $Paul Molitor hit a sinking liner to LF; Steve Kemp appeared to catch it but 3B umpire Bill Deegan signaled no catch; neither Jim Gantner nor Molitor saw the signal at first and Molitor started back to the dugout, thinking he was out; Ganter started to 2B, went back to 1B and then finally to 2B Brewers Manager George Bamberger ejected by 1B umpire Jerry Neudecker
ej,moned101,P,neudj901,Call at 1B Don Money ejected by 1B umpire Jerry Neudecker

ej,jackr001,P,shulj901,Charging mound Reggie Jackson ejected by HP umpire John Shulock after throwing his bat at pitcher Mike Caldwell and charging the mound; Jackson claimed Caldwell threw a brushback at him

ej,gantj001,P,fordd901,Fighting $Jim Gantner was hit on the face by Lou Piniella's elbow as the latter slid into 3B; they both fell to the ground but Gantner jumped up and went after Piniella; both benches cleared; Gantner ejected by 3B umpire Dale Ford

$Dan Ford was still unhappy with some close pitches by Lary Sorensen from a week before; he was backed away from the plate here and took a few steps toward the mound but was stopped by catcher Buck Martinez

ej,fordd001,P,goetr901,Charging mound ej,sorel001,P,goetr901,Throwing at Dan Ford Lary Sorensen threw the third pitch behind Dan Ford's head; Ford charged the mound and both benches cleared; Ford and Sorensen ejected by HP umpire Russ Goetz
